messages.subject: NE Conference -- Rowe
messages.msgSnippet: Hi!!  I thought I already sent this out but I never saw it come up in the digests.  So, if it already came up sorry for the repeat. Rowe conference center can
messages.messageBody:
Hi!! I thought I already sent this out but I never saw it come up in
the digests. So, if it already came up sorry for the repeat.

Rowe conference center can be checked out at retreat@...
Sounds a bit like the place people are describing in Great Barrington.
Nice camp,with hiking trails, various bunk houses, etc..
Usually prices for conferences there include housing, vegetarian food,
and the workshops.

Also wanted to mention a group I met last year that did a one day
unschooling workshop in Arlington MA. Maybe they could be of some help
or have some ideas to share.
homeschoolingtogether.org

Looking forward to meeting others--Sharon :)
